CustomField.description: Indicates that Salesforce Shield-Enabled is enabled on the Org so that Altify Apps can take the appropriate action for queries that are broken by Shield.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This makes Altify software compatible with a Salesforce Shield-enabled org. However, it affects certain Altify querying operations, so the setting should only be enabled on the advice of Altify.
CustomField.label: Salesforce Shield-Enabled
